title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. II, subch. E, pt. 293 - Joint Collection And Enforcement Activity
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. II, subch. E, pt. 293 - Joint Collection And Enforcement Activity

State Regulations
§ 293.1 - Joint assessment of taxes and proportionate division of payment
§ 293.2 - Joint collection and enforcement activity by the State Tax Commission

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. II, subch. E, pt. 293

Statutory authority: Tax Law, §§171, 697, 1312; Administrative Code of the City of New York, §
11-1797

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
